Reviews.Title: “Poor place in the perfect location”
Reviews.Author: Joakkin
Reviews.Content: hostel unbeatable location barcelona plaza catalunya la rambla shops street zara esprit el corte inglés hm hard rock cafe etc you´ll reach metro camp nou parque güell main sites walking bad improvement bedrooms beds terrible walls furnitures building broken unclean actually stuff bad except baths excelent modern recommend you´re outside day return sleep morning location reception guys nice free wifi write adress it´s surrounded shops street it´s easy miss

Reviews.Title: “Great location, but crying for renovation”
Reviews.Author: JU050
Reviews.Content: stayed twice june 2011 2010 time 2 nights time purely chosen location middle close placa catalunya 5 minute walk la rambla aerobus airport el corte ingles department store nearby short stroll barceloneta mare location location staff friendly especially night tho hardly speaks english balcony noticed shared bathroom renovated previous visit 2010 overall tiny desperate painting except beds wardrobe location price hardly beaten recommend 23 nights sleep stay center barcelona

Reviews.Title: “Perfect location, just in the middle of everywhere!”
Reviews.Author: AFS82
Reviews.Content: spent 4 nights barcelona sightseeing hostel literally 1 minute walking distance fron placa catalunya didnt public metro except 3 4 times visit barca fc museum sagrada familia parc guell explored barcelona walking hostel regarding style furniture comfort didnt started day 9 am return hostel 11 30 pm straight bed street hostel lies lively shopping centres el cort zara massimo mango esprit retaurants hostel staff cheerful helpful

HotelInfo.Address: Avda. Puerta del Angel, 24, 08002 Barcelona, Spain
